post.author: 이성기
post.content:
I am not sure if any one interested in Halifax opportunity. If you are, then mail to me. I can forward it to this agent.
Good thing is Halifax living cost is half of Toronto. You can save a lot and weather is milder than here. (ps: don't contact her directly at first time. They will not show interest to you then)
FYI (For your information) -----------------
Hi Scott,
My name is Andrea Duda and I work for Keane, Inc. (www.keane.com) out of our headquarters in Boston, MA.
The reason for my email is that I would be very interested to talk to you further about your background. This role would be a full-time, permanent position in our Halifax, NS Application Development Center.
If you are interested in relocating, please email me your most recent resume as well the best times I can reach you over the phone.
Talk to you soon,
Andrea Duda Sr. Corporate Recruiter Mobile: 603.490.3890
post.title: Halifax, NS Application Development
